ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] HI and Befallen question...
ygData.msgSnippet: You should be able to cause at level 15 were mostly light blue to green to my Barb Shammy but to my friends level 15 Dark Elf Warrior they were mostly dark
ygData.messageBody:
You should be able to cause at level 15 were mostly light blue to green to
my Barb Shammy but to my friends level 15 Dark Elf Warrior they were mostly
dark blue to yellow

Hope this helps
Halyburton Bearhugger 43 Barb Shammy
Legion of Vengeance

Qapmoc 11 HalfElf Ranger
Doktari 7 HiElf Cleric
Defender of the Faith

Illicon 12 HiElf Chanter

Saryrn

----- Original Message -----
From: "fire_n_butterfly" <no_reply@yahoogroups.com>
To: <theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, November 08, 2002 2:58 PM
Subject: [The EverQuest Tavern] HI and Befallen question...


> Hi to all. Cahlia here, 19th season wood elf druid, who is trying
> desperately to level to 20 and claim my surname heheh! Oy I hate
> taking 1 step forward and 2 steps back!!
>
> Anyhow, I was looking up a quest yesterday and found one I am
> interested in. Starts in Felwithe talking to the high elf who stands
> by the water and tells you he is troubled by his son's disappearance,
> please talk to someone else. I found that if you go to Befallen and
> kill a skeletal foreman, it will spawn Sir (something or other starts
> with an A). I got the directions, etc. He gives you a token you take
> back and give to the high elf and he gives you his daughter's token.
> A pretty cool amulet with 3AC, +3wis, +3int, +3 cha, +3Sta, and +3
> agi I do believe. Anyhow....here's my question...can I make it in
> Befallen at level 20 ok? I'm scared from what I read to attempt it.
> Apparently everything aggros terribly. EQAtlas says level 7-25+ mobs,
> but since they are all necros and thermagists, the damages are much
> worse than they con. I HATE dying, and I'm too chicken to attempt
> without some feedback. Any suggestions or stories?
>
> Thanks!
> Cahlia
> 19th Season,Wood Elf Druid of Tunare
> Morrel Thule Server
> <Fates of Destiny>
